text: Hagi agrama esuno'a Isipi mopa eme eri haviza hugahie. Ana nehina krimo zamahe frigahiema hu'na huhampri'noa vahera krimo zamahe nefrina, kinafima vugahazema hu'na huhampri'noa vahera kinafi nevanage'za, bainati kazinteti zamahe frigahazema hu'na huhampri'noa vahera bainati kazinteti zamahe frigahaze.
